featured.text: At the beginning of the semester, the teacher told the students that late assignments would receive a low grade as a _____.

definition.zh_def: 學期，通常指學校或大學的學習期間，通常為一個學年中的一部分。
definition.en_def: A semester is an academic term that typically lasts half a year, used in schools and universities.
definition.example: I have three exams this semester.
